channel.title: Is there a quick way to find the line number
channel.description:
lolz i got an error on like line 11015 and i dont fancy counting that far so is there some sort of line search? if so please post
thanks rob[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 06:19:20 PM[/size][hr]nvm i am a noob i finally found :P !!!! so simple aint it
